notes.32-8-9: Session 2. Party sets out from Squamusport in the evening.
notes.32-8-10: Heavy rain; party finds the body of the goliath warrior.
notes.32-8-15: Feast of Mid-Summer; Low Confluence.  Party's first day in Nelsa.
notes.32-8-13: Party arrives at the junction of White Forest Road and the Great Zephyran Road.
notes.32-8-14: Session 4. Party arrives in Nelsa, close to dusk.
notes.32-10-1: The Moonies leave Nelsa, and head north to Silver Falls.
notes.32-8-16: Uneventful day. Val and Cloaken shop at Crazy Bertram's.
